trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Claims" /> namespace contains classes that implement the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) claims-based identity authorization model.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Claims" />命名空間包含類別，該類別會實作 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 宣告架構的識別授權模型。

trans-unit.source: This model includes the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> class and the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個模型包含<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" />類別和<see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet" />類別。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with .NET Framework 4.5 and the integration of Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) into the .NET Framework, the WCF claims-based identity model has been superseded by WIF.
trans-unit.target: 從 .NET Framework 4.5 以及 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 整合於 .NET Framework 開始，WCF 宣告式識別模型已由 WIF 所取代。

trans-unit.source: WIF provides a claims-based identity object model that can be used to provide authentication and authorization across several Microsoft product stacks, including the CLR, WCF, and ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: WIF 提供宣告架構的識別物件模型，此模型可以用來提供跨幾個 Microsoft 產品堆疊的驗證和授權，包括 CLR、WCF 和 ASP.NET。

trans-unit.source: The WIF classes that represent claims, claim types, and identities and principals that are based on claims are contained in the <see cref="N:System.Security.Claims" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 代表宣告、宣告型別以及以宣告為基礎的識別和主體的 WIF 類別是包含在<see cref="N:System.Security.Claims" />命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with .NET 4.5, these classes should be used instead of those in the <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Claims" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 從 .NET 4.5 開始，應使用這些類別，而不使用 <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Claims" /> 命名空間中的類別。
